page.title: 18SPORT IN MORETON
page.content: In Moreton there is a{sports centre,}a {football}club, a{cricket}club, a{bowls club, two{badminton}clubs, a{tennis} club and a{hockey}club. At the multi {sports centre}football, tennis, squash, badminton, handball, volleyball, gymnastics and swimmimg can be undertaken. The Moreton{Tennis} Club has about 40 members and the courts are at the side of the cricket field. The{Cricket}Club has two teams, both of which have had success in recent years. They play in the Mike Proctor League on Saturdays and play friendly matches on Sundays. On Mondays 40-50 colts (juniors) have coaching. The juniors play in the Vale Junior League and the seniors play in the Cotswold Hills League. The {football}team plays in the Hellenic League and in 1984 played in the preliminary round of the F.A. Cup.
